rows.label: tev015601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev015601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Oliver about his work.

rows.label: tev015601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev015601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Oliver if he has any interesting news.

rows.label: tev015601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Oliver about his experiences with the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev015601_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Oliver about his experiences with the Prone.

rows.label: tev015601_SEL0051
rows.name:
Ask Oliver for his opinions on
the xenoforms living in NLA.

rows.label: tev015601_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Oliver if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0001
rows.name:
Due to a shortage of construction workers,
little progress had been made in building the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0002
rows.name:
We just need a good idea on how to turn this sad
state of affairs arou—Hey! I've got it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0003
rows.name:
You know those grex indigens that are always running
wild outside the city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0004
rows.name:
They're a hearty breed! What if we captured a few,
strapped 'em to carts, and used them to haul heavy
materials?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0005
rows.name:
...Wait. Wait, wait. No. That's dumb. I'm an idiot.
They'd probably eat everybody the moment we let 'em
come inside the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0006
rows.name:
Hmm... I have to keep searching for the right idea.
I can't allow New LA to languish in this unfinished
state forever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0008
rows.name:
I ran into a BLADE named Robert at the west gate
when I went to the industrial district to get materials.
That guy is so unbelievably careful about everything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0009
rows.name:
He double and triple checks all his equipment,
and pursues all his missions in the most meticulous
fashion possible. Dude just exudes prudence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0010
rows.name:
You ever hear the expression "measure twice,
cut once?" Well I don't even want to know how
many times Robert measures before he cuts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0011
rows.name:
There's got to be an expression for that, right?
Like, "measure nine times, forget to cut," or...I dunno.
I'll work on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0016
rows.name:
"What's this thingy, maybe?" "What's up with that?"
Arggh! Why can't the Ma-non shut up with their
questions?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0017
rows.name:
Dealing with the Ma-non is exhausting. It's like trying
to hold a conversation with a really unconfident
hummingbird.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0018
rows.name:
I guess I should just go eat some of that shinuyuni
garlic that grows in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0019
rows.name:
Because there's no way I'm ever gonna be able to deal
with them if I don't have enough energy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0025
rows.name:
Look at that Prone over there! Picking up a crate that I
couldn't lift in a million years and tossing it around as
if it were made of tissue paper.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0026
rows.name:
It's great being able to move stuff like that without
having to use heavy machinery, but good sweet lord,
you would not BELIEVE how much they eat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0027
rows.name:
Each one gobbles down as much food as 20 humans!
I'd still take them over heavy machinery any day,
but the machines got 'em beat at fuel efficiency.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0028
rows.name:
Their favorite food are these nutrient-packed snails
called ashizel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0029
rows.name:
They live on the plains outside the east gate. I oughta
just hire a BLADE to go collect a whole bunch for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0035
rows.name:
First it was the Ma-non, then the Prone, and now we
got Orphe and Wrothians and Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0036
rows.name:
I never imagined New LA would end up crawling
with xenoforms like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0037
rows.name:
Don't get me wrong, I hate the alien bastards who
blew up Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG0038
rows.name:
But it's nice that there are good xenos as well as bad.
You can never have too many friends, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG1001
rows.name:
So I talked to Robert—he's a BLADE—at the west gate
when I went to pick up materials in the industrial
district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG1002
rows.name:
He said he ran into some real trouble on this joint
mission he did with a group of Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG1003
rows.name:
Being the perfectionist that he is, he serviced every part
of his armored vehicle and thought it was good to go.
But you'll never guess what happened next![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015601_MSG1004
rows.name:
...Huh? You're the one who helped him out of that
situation? Oh, wow! You're pretty incredible![ST:wait ]
